1.title: Week 1: The Journey Begins
1.description: This week marks the beginning of your pregnancy journey, even though conception hasn't happened yet.
developments: Your body is preparing for ovulation
The lining of your uterus is thickening
1.babyMessage: Hi Mama! üëã This is the beginning of our amazing journey together. I can't wait to meet you!

2.title: Week 2: Preparing for Conception
2.description: Your body is getting ready for conception. This is typically when ovulation occurs.
developments: Ovulation is likely to occur this week
The egg is maturing in the ovary
Your body temperature may rise slightly
2.babyMessage: Mama, our journey is about to begin! üí´ Take good care of yourself, I'll be here soon!

3.title: Week 3: Conception Week
3.sizeDescription: Smaller than a grain of rice
3.description: Conception has likely occurred this week. The fertilized egg is beginning its journey.
3.babyMessage: I'm just starting my adventure, Mama! üå± This is where our story begins!

4.title: Week 4: The Beginning
4.description: Your baby is just a cluster of cells, but amazing development is already beginning!
4.babyMessage: I'm here! üåü I'm tiny like a poppy seed, but I'm growing every second. Thank you for taking care of me, Mama!

5.title: Week 5: Heart Development
5.description: Your baby's heart is beginning to form and beat, though it's still very early.
5.babyMessage: My heart is starting to beat, Mama! ‚ù§Ô∏è Can you feel the love already?

6.title: Week 6: Facial Features Begin
6.description: Your baby's facial features are starting to form, and the heart is beating regularly.
momTips: Avoid strong smells if they bother you
6.babyMessage: My tiny heart is beating just for you, Mama! üíì I'm starting to look more like a little human now!

7.title: Week 7: Growing Rapidly
7.description: Your baby is growing rapidly, doubling in size this week.
7.babyMessage: I'm doubling in size this week, Mama! üå∏ My little hands and feet are getting more defined!

8.title: Week 8: Rapid Growth
8.description: Your baby is growing rapidly and major organs are developing.
developments: Arms and legs are growing longer
8.babyMessage: I'm growing so fast, Mama! ü´ê My little fingers and toes are forming. Can't wait to hold your hand!

9.title: Week 9: Basic Physiology Complete
9.description: Your baby's basic physiology is complete, and growth will accelerate from here.
9.babyMessage: All my important parts are here now! üé® My organs are growing and I'm officially a fetus!

10.title: Week 10: Entering Fetal Stage
10.description: Your baby is now officially called a fetus and is no longer an embryo.
10.babyMessage: I'm growing so fast, Mama! üí´ I can even move around now, though you can't feel it yet!

11.title: Week 11: Rapid Development
11.description: Your baby is developing rapidly, with organs beginning to function.
developments: Hands and feet are more defined
11.babyMessage: My organs are starting to work, Mama! üé≠ I'm practicing all sorts of movements in here!

12.title: Week 12: End of First Trimester
12.description: Congratulations! You've reached an important milestone.
12.babyMessage: We made it through the first trimester, Mama! üéâ I'm getting stronger every day. I love you!

13.title: Week 13: Second Trimester Begins
13.description: Welcome to the second trimester! Many women feel better during this period.
13.babyMessage: Welcome to the second trimester, Mama! üåà I hope you're feeling better. I'm getting stronger every day!

14.title: Week 14: Growing Stronger
14.description: Your baby is growing stronger and more active.
14.babyMessage: I can make funny faces now, Mama! üòä My facial muscles are working and I'm practicing expressions!

15.title: Week 15: Rapid Growth Phase
15.description: Your baby is in a rapid growth phase, and you might start feeling movements.
15.babyMessage: I'm growing so much, Mama! üå± My hair is starting to grow and I can sense light now!

16.title: Week 16: Second Trimester Begins
16.description: Welcome to the second trimester! Many women feel their best during this time.
16.babyMessage: I'm getting stronger, Mama! üí™ You might even feel me moving around soon!

17.title: Week 17: Getting Stronger
17.description: Your baby is getting stronger and more active every day.
17.babyMessage: My bones are getting stronger and I'm stretching my little limbs! üí™ You might feel me kicking soon!

18.title: Week 18: Anatomy Scan Week
18.description: This is often when you'll have your anatomy scan ultrasound.
18.babyMessage: I can hear you now, Mama! üéµ Your voice is my favorite sound. Keep singing to me!

19.title: Week 19: Sensory Development
19.description: Your baby's senses are developing rapidly this week.
developments: Brain specializes in smell, taste, hearing, sight, and touch
Arms and legs are in proportion
momTips: Talk and sing to your baby
19.babyMessage: My senses are developing so fast! üëÇ I can taste, smell, and even feel touch. Talk to me more, Mama!

20.title: Week 20: Halfway Point
20.description: Congratulations! You're halfway through your pregnancy.
developments: Baby can now hear and respond to sounds
momTips: Schedule anatomy scan if not done
20.babyMessage: Halfway there, Mama! üéà I can hear your voice now and I love listening to you. Keep talking to me!

21.title: Week 21: Rapid Weight Gain
21.description: Your baby is gaining weight rapidly from here on out.
developments: Bone marrow begins making blood cells
21.babyMessage: I'm getting chubby, Mama! üçº I'm gaining weight fast and I love doing somersaults in here!

22.title: Week 22: Active Baby
22.description: Your baby is becoming more active and you'll likely feel regular movements.
developments: Baby can perceive light and dark
momTips: Shop for maternity and nursing bras
22.babyMessage: I'm so active now! ü§∏ You can definitely feel me moving around. I love when you touch your belly!

23.title: Week 23: Hearing Development
23.description: Your baby's hearing is becoming more sophisticated.
23.babyMessage: I can hear music, Mama! üé∂ Play me your favorite songs. I'm listening and learning!

24.title: Week 24: Viability Milestone
24.description: Your baby reaches the milestone of viability this week.
developments: Baby's skin is thin and red
24.babyMessage: I reached an important milestone, Mama! üéØ I'm getting ready for the world outside!

25.title: Week 25: Growing Stronger
25.description: Your baby is growing stronger and more viable each day.
developments: Hair color and texture are set
Blood vessels are developing in lungs
25.babyMessage: My hair is growing in, Mama! üíá I wonder what color it will be. Can't wait for you to see!

26.title: Week 26: Brain Development
26.description: Your baby's brain is developing rapidly this week.
26.babyMessage: I can open my eyes now, Mama! üëÄ I'm practicing for when I get to see your beautiful face!

27.title: Week 27: Second Trimester Ends
27.description: You're approaching the end of your second trimester.
27.babyMessage: Welcome to the third trimester! üéä I'm getting ready to meet you. The countdown is on!

28.title: Week 28: Third Trimester Begins
28.description: Welcome to the third trimester! Your baby's survival odds are very good now.
28.babyMessage: I'm getting smarter every day! üß† My brain is growing so fast. Keep reading to me, Mama!

29.title: Week 29: Rapid Brain Development
29.description: Your baby's brain is developing very rapidly now.
developments: Head is growing to accommodate brain
Baby can control body temperature better
29.babyMessage: It's getting cozy in here, Mama! üè† I'm running out of space but I'm still doing my kicks!

30.title: Week 30: Growing Rapidly
30.description: Your baby is growing rapidly and running out of room.
developments: Running out of room in uterus
Bone marrow is forming red blood cells
30.babyMessage: All my senses are working! üëÉ I can see, hear, taste, smell, and touch. I'm ready to explore!

31.title: Week 31: Final Growth Spurt
31.description: Your baby is entering their final major growth spurt.
31.babyMessage: I'm practicing breathing, Mama! üí® Getting ready for my first breath in your arms!

32.title: Week 32: Immune System Development
32.description: Your baby's immune system is getting stronger.
32.babyMessage: I'm getting into position, Mama! üéØ Soon I'll be head down and ready for my grand entrance!

33.title: Week 33: Preparing for Birth
33.description: Your baby is starting to prepare for birth.
developments: Skull bones are not yet fused
33.babyMessage: My lungs are almost ready! ü´Å I'm preparing for life outside. Can't wait to breathe real air!

34.title: Week 34: Final Preparations
34.description: Your baby is making final preparations for life outside the womb.
developments: Making final preparations for outside life
34.babyMessage: I'm almost fully developed! üåü My body is getting ready. Soon we'll cuddle for real!

35.title: Week 35: Lungs Maturing
35.description: Your baby's lungs are rapidly maturing now.
developments: Most babies are head-down by now
momTips: Monitor for signs of preterm labor
üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!
35.babyMessage: I could meet you any day now, Mama! üéÄ My bags are packed and I'm ready!

36.title: Week 36: Full Term Approaching
36.description: Your baby is approaching full term and could arrive soon.
developments: Baby is gaining about 1 ounce per day
momTips: üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!
36.babyMessage: I'm officially full term! üéâ I'm ready to meet you whenever the time is right!

37.title: Week 37: Full Term
37.description: Congratulations! Your baby is now considered full term.
developments: Baby is now considered full term
Lungs are mature enough for breathing
Baby's head may be engaged in pelvis
momTips: Be ready for labor at any time
üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!
37.babyMessage: My grip is strong now! üí™ I'm practicing holding on for when I hold your finger for the first time!

38.title: Week 38: Ready for Birth
38.description: Your baby is ready for birth and gaining final weight.
momTips: üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!
38.babyMessage: Any day now, Mama! üåà I'm so excited to finally see you and feel your touch!

39.title: Week 39: Almost Time
39.description: Your baby is almost ready to meet you!
momTips: Labor is likely to start soon
üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!

40.title: Week 40: Due Date
40.description: Congratulations! You've reached your due date.
developments: Ready for life outside the womb
momTips: Baby may arrive any day now
üí° After your baby arrives, you can use this app to track your postpartum period and menstrual cycle. Your wellness journey continues!
40.babyMessage: Today's my due date, Mama! üë∂ I'm ready to meet you! When we start our new adventure together, remember that this app will help you track your wellness journey as you recover. Love you! üíï

40.title: Week 40: Due Date
40.description: Congratulations! You've reached your due date.
developments: Ready for life outside the womb
momTips: Baby may arrive any day now
40.babyMessage: Today's my due date, Mama! üë∂ I'm ready to meet you! Let's start our new adventure together!
